titles: The cure of misprision or Selected notes, upon sundry questions in controversie (of main concernment) between the word, and the world. Tending to reconcile mens judgements, and unite their affections. Composed and published for the common good : as being a probable means to cure prejudice, and misprision in such as are not past cure. / by R. Junius.
author: Younge, Richard.
publisher: Printed, by Tho. Paine, for Benjamin Allen, and are to bee sold at his shop in Popes-Head Alley,
notes: Annotation on Thomason copy: "feb: 25 1645"; the 6 in the date has been crossed out; written after "R. Junius" is "A grocer".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Conflict management --  Religious aspects --  Christianity --  Early works to 1800.
